{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=RAX80 |revision=(Jaguar)
Nighthawk AX8 |series=AX6000 |asin=B01MQDZXA4 |price=400 |est_release_date=11/07/2018 |fcc_date=08/21/2018 |manuf_country=Vietnam |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12H376 |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY318200414 |ic_id=4054A-18200414 |pcb_id=U12H376 |pwr_v=19 |pwr_amp=3.16 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4908;BCM4908KFEBG, TK1735, 4AT-04 Z2AW; |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W29N04GVSIAA |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W634GU6MB-12 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.1 (Gen 1) |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1821 P21, 4410-01 B2 W 000; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac+ax |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43684;BROADCOM, BCM43684KRFBG, TK1821 P21, 4410-01 B2 W 000; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn+ax |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Broadcom |eth_chip2_model=BCM54612E;BCM54162E, B1KMLG, TE1812 P21, 000 3 W; |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=5 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz High-Power WLAN Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85331-11;;4; ,,, 5GHz High-Power WLAN Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85743-21;;4; |flags=Wi-Fi 6, 1024QAM, VHT160, HE160, Link Aggregation, LACP, MU-MIMO, DFS (master/slave), fan, |stock_os=Linux;4.1;aarch64; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac+ax |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=14:59:C0 |oui_eth=14:59:C0 }}
:• '''1150''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ax 802.11ax] (40MHz chan.) :• '''4800''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ax 802.11ax] (160MHz chan.) = '''''AX6000'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk AX8 Smart WiFi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/RAX80.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=RAX80}} This router was initially referred to as the '''Nighthawk X12''' in FCC documents :but it has been released as the '''Netgear Nighthawk AX8 (RAX80)'''. Software/Firmware Version is listed as "Linux 4.1 (aarch64) 17.10.25.3" :in the ''Test Report (DFS)_rev 3'' FCC document. *Web GUI: http://www.routerlogin.net ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33217-first-wifi6-peek-asus-rt-ax88u-netgear-rax80 ''First Peek At Wi-Fi 6: ASUS RT-AX88U & Netgear RAX80'' on '''SNB'''] *[https://www.techbang.com/posts/63813-ring-80211ax-wi-fi-6-gate-netgear-nighthawk-ax8-rax80-wireless-network-router-measurement?page=1 ''802.11ax/Wi-Fi 6 Netgear Nighthawk AX8 RAX80'' on '''TechBang'''] (CN) :SoC: [[Broadcom]] BCM4908 ARM 64-bit (Cortex-B35) @1.8GHz :RAM: 2x [[Samsung]] K4B4G1646E-BYMA (1GB DDR3-1866) :Flash: [[Winbond]] W29N04GVSIAA (4Gb NAND MLC) :WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM43684 (2x 2.4/5GHz) :FEM: [[Skyworks]] SKY85331-11 (4x 2.4GHz) ::[[Skyworks]] SKY85743-21 (4x 5GHz) :LAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM54612E (GbE PHY) :OEM: [[Foxconn]] U12H376 ===Forum threads=== *[https://www.snbforums.com/threads/netgear-jaguar-nighthawk-x12-ax6000-wireless-router.48488/ ''Netgear Jaguar (Nighthawk X12) AX6000 Router'' on '''SNB''' forums] ===News=== *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/13325/netgear-announces-nighthawk-rax80-rax120 ''Netgear Announces Nighthawk RAX80 and RAX120'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[https://www.broadcom.com/company/news/product-releases/2366450 ''802.11ax Max Wi-Fi Access Point SoC'' on '''Broadcom'''] *[https://24wireless.info/netgear-11ax-jaguar-fcc ''Netgear Jaguar (Nighthawk X12) '' on '''24wireless.info'''] *[https://24wireless.info/list-of-11ax-routers ''List of 802.11ax Routers'' on '''24wireless.info'''] ===See also=== :[[List of Netgear Nighthawk Products]] • [[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] *[[Netgear RAX40 (Nighthawk AX4)]] - AX3000 • ''Nighthawk'' (RAX40) *[[Netgear RAX80 (Nighthawk AX8)]] - AX6000 • ''Jaguar'' AX8 (RAX80) *[[Netgear RAX120 (Nighthawk AX12)]] - AX6000 • ''Leopard'' (RAX120) *[[Netgear RAX200 (Nighthawk Tri-Band AX12)]] - AX11000 (RAX200) __NOTOC__
